# condsurv

The `condsurv` package contains a function for generating conditional survival estimates with associated confidence intervals, and a function for plotting conditional survival curves.

## Installation

Install the package using

```{r eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("zabore/condsurv")
```

## Documentation

This package is documented using [pkgdown](https://pkgdown.r-lib.org/articles/pkgdown.html), and the resulting website is available at [http://www.emilyzabor.me/condsurv/](http://www.emilyzabor.me/condsurv/), where detailed Tutorials can be found covering all of the package functionality.

See [http://www.emilyzabor.me/condsurv/reference/](http://www.emilyzabor.me/condsurv/reference/) for detailed function documentation.
